channel.title: Need help with option interfaces [317]
channel.description:
So i have the new option interfaces as you can see below
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/16/pwd4.png/][IMG]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/5777/pwd4.png[/img][/URL]
But I want it to be like
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/842/8mw3.png/][IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/6017/8mw3.png[/img][/URL]
Also I am using bluurs client. Can anyone please help me or does anyone know a bluurs client that does have the older options?
